Params.Name: Category
Params.Description: The category you want the ranked system to be handled in!

Params.Name: Channel
Params.Description: Staff Channel - Where you will manage the ranked system!

/Setup.Description: This will start the setup process

Steps.Description: Will Create / Select Category, and save it in the database.
Will Create / Select Channel, sand save it to the database.
Will send setup embed to staff channel
